title: Medicines Board Act 1995 (No. 29 of 1995) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Medical Devices (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Medical Devices (Amendment) 

Regulations 2021. 

(2) The Principal Regulations and these Regulations may be cited together 

as the Medical Devices Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited medical device (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) principal regulation regulation may cited together medical device regulation 2021

title: Medicines Board Act 1995 (No. 29 of 1995) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Medical Devices
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Medical Devices 

Regulations (S.I. No. 261 of 2021).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean medical device regulation (s.i no 261 2021)

title: Medicines Board Act 1995 (No. 29 of 1995) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended—
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) by deleting the definition of “combination product”; 

(b) 

in the definition of “device”, by substituting “a device referred to 
in the second subparagraph of Article 1(8), (9) or (10) of the EU 
Regulation” for “a combination product”, 

(c) 

by substituting for the definition of “in-house device” the 
following: 

“‘in-house device’ means a device which— 

(a) 

(b) 

is manufactured and used only within a health 
institution, 

complies with all of the conditions in Article 5(5) of 
the EU Regulation, and 

(c) 

is not manufactured on an industrial scale;”, 

(d) by substituting for the definition of “member state” the following: 

“‘member state’ means a member state of the European Economic 
Area;”, 

(e) 

in the definition of “premises”, by deleting “medical”, 

(f) 

in the definition of “record”— 

(i) 

by substituting “thing” for “device” in both places it occurs, 
and 

1 OJ No. L 117, 5.5.2017, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [510] 3 

(ii) by substituting “without the aid of” for “without the aid or” 

in both places it occurs, and 

(g) by substituting for the definition of “relevant thing” the 

following: 

“‘relevant thing’ means— 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

a device, 

a device referred to in the second subparagraph of 
Article 1(8), (9) or (10) of the EU Regulation, 

an in-house device, 

any article or substance used in the manufacture, 
processing, 
preparation, 
storage, distribution or advertising of a device 
referred to in subparagraph (a), (b) or (c), 

packaging, 

labelling, 

(e) 

a system, 

(f) 

(g) 

a procedure pack, or 

another product being used, or purporting to be used, 
for a medical purpose;”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 3(1) principal regulation amended-- (a) deleting definition combination product (b) definition device substituting device referred second subparagraph article 1(8) (9) (10) eu regulation combination product (c) substituting definition in-house device following in-house device mean device which-- (a) (b) manufactured used within health institution complies condition article 5(5) eu regulation (c) manufactured industrial scale (d) substituting definition member state following member state mean member state european economic area (e) definition premise deleting medical (f) definition record -- (i) substituting thing device place occurs 1 oj no l 117 5.5.2017 p 1 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 12th october 2021 510 3 (ii) substituting without aid without aid place occurs (g) substituting definition relevant thing following relevant thing means-- (a) (b) (c) (d) device device referred second subparagraph article 1(8) (9) (10) eu regulation in-house device article substance used manufacture processing preparation storage distribution advertising device referred subparagraph (a) (b) (c) packaging labelling (e) system (f) (g) procedure pack another product used purporting used medical purpose

title: Medicines Board Act 1995 (No. 29 of 1995) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 8. Regulation 23 of the Principal Regulations is amended—
text_raw:
8. Regulation 23 of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

in paragraph (1)— 

(i) 

(ii) 

in subparagraph (l), by substituting “in accordance with 
Article 80(1) of the EU Regulation ” for “referred to in 
Article 80(1) of the EU Regulation in relation to an adverse 
event”, and 

in subparagraph (m), by substituting “in accordance with 
Article 80(2), (3) or (4) of the EU Regulation, as 
applicable” for “the information referred to in Article 80(2) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [510] 

of the EU Regulation in relation to a serious adverse event, 
in accordance with that provision or Article 80(3) or (4) of 
the EU Regulation, as applicable”, and 

(b) 

in paragraph (4), by substituting “Article 65(a) or (b) of the EU 
Regulation” for “Article 65(1)(a) or (b) of the EU Regulation”.

title: Medicines Board Act 1995 (No. 29 of 1995) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 9. Regulation 24 of the Principal Regulations is amended—
text_raw:
9. Regulation 24 of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

in paragraph (b), by substituting “device referred to in the second 
subparagraph of Article 1(8), (9) or (10) of the EU Regulation,” 
for “combination product”, 

(b) 

in paragraph (z), by substituting “these Regulations” for “this 
Regulation”, 

(c) 

by substituting for paragraph (bb) the following: 

“(bb) tampers with any device or other relevant thing, or any 
material or accessory designated to be used as part of or with a 
device or other relevant thing,”, and 

(d) 

in paragraph (cc), by substituting “Regulation 28(3)(i) or (j)” for 
Regulation 29(3)(i) or (j).

title: Medicines Board Act 1995 (No. 29 of 1995) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Medical Devices Regulations 2021 to exclude 
Switzerland from the definition of “member state” and make various other minor 
changes. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [510]
